bike.description: S-Works Transition design, full aero tubing, internal brake and derailleur guides, SLX, double-butted, heat-treated

components.description: S-Works Aero Carbon Transition Speed Zertz, monocoque super high modulus carbon legs, carbon crown, carbon threadless steerer
S-Works Mindset, 1 1/8� integrated threadless, triple sealed stainless cartridge bearings, carbon cone with 2 each 5mm spacers
Specialized Pro, 3D forged alloy, 31.8mm bar clamp, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt cap
Specialized Zertz Transition, bull moose bend, 31.8mm diameter
Profile Designs Sonic Stryke 2004 with integrated arm rests
Body Geometry, thin Bar Phat, cork ribbon
Mavic Cosmic Carbone SL SSC, 18 hole, Mavic QR
Mavic Cosmic Carbone SL SSC, 20 hole, sealed freehub, Mavic QR
Mavic Cosmic Carbone SL SSC alloy bladed, alloy nipples
S-Works Turbo Ultra Light, presta valve
Specialized Transition Speed Zertz, Aero Carbon Fiber, 350mm. Note: Some bikes appear with Specialized Pavé, advanced composite with Zertz insert, 27.2x350mm
Chain stay protector, reflectors, chain catcher, clear coat, owners manual
